TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: .........

Give you my phone to make you feel better.

(for a few minutes)

Edited September 17, 2013 by spink00
Additions!
*starts playing with a Powerglide transformer toy I took out of my pocket*
You can't play minecraft! you have to do it ALPHABETICALLY...

I find that amusing coming from the one whose name starts with the last letter of the alphabet and goes immediately to the fifth.

*Flex*
looks at your bacon moustache and gives you a confused look...
Looks at you with a confused look for looking at bacon with a confused look.

Causes one of these restaurants to appear in a large blank wall while looking at two people (who are looking at each other with a confused look) with a confused look. Proceeds to order every possible dish for everyone.
I respond by flipping my MP3 player to non-stop elevatorcat for the duration of the ride.

Starts to murmur the bombs are bursting in the air to self which Subconsciously thinking this elevator ride is taking way to long, and it could be stuck* Send more reinforcements Aircraft Carrier Olympia! They're still hitting the base! We don't have a half billion dollar budget for nothing so get to it!
Wonders how so many people can fit into so little space
Freaks out from being in such a confined space and randomly teleports out.
(because you teleported out )
Yet I come in with a pole so I can in the wind to make you not alone since im a living flag.

Tears down the flag and says "THE SOLAR EMPIRE IS SUPREME!"

(not that I actually have anything against the NLR, but i just didn't know what to put here )
Just stare at him/her, confused.
Uh what is that? Also sylandro, There wasn't much to survive during the forum migration....
Looks at both at you "isn't there only susppose to be two avatars in the elevator?"
Randomly teleports back into the elevator because I just felt like it
Steals the Met.
Eats absolutely everything but the elevator shaft, the elevator, and its contents.
Hug. That. Kerbal.

oh that tf2 meme again -ignores-

Edited September 26, 2013 by Dooz

Oh, hey! a galaxy!

*Puts you in my submarine*
Sparks and explodes from water exposure.
